Title: Ship Building
Description: Learn how to build and customize your ship using voxel blocks.

Steps.Title: Introduction to Ship Building
Steps.Message: Your ship is built from voxel blocks. You can add, remove, and customize blocks to create your perfect vessel!

Steps.Title: Entering Build Mode
Steps.Message: Press [B] to open the Ship Builder. This is where you can add new blocks, choose materials, and modify your ship's structure.

Steps.Title: Block Types
Steps.Message:
There are several block types:
• Hull - Basic structure
• Armor - Protection
• Engine - Propulsion
• Thruster - Maneuvering
• Generator - Power
• Shield - Defense
• Cargo - Storage
• Cockpit - Control center
• Turret - Weapons mounting

Steps.Title: Materials Matter
Steps.Message:
Different materials provide different stats:
• Iron - Basic, cheap
• Titanium - Stronger
• Naonite - Energy efficient
• Trinium - Lightweight
• Xanion - Advanced
• Ogonite - Powerful
• Avorion - Ultimate

Better materials unlock as you explore deeper into the galaxy!

Steps.Title: Building Tips
Steps.Message:
Tips for building:
• Add more engines for speed
• Balance your ship's mass
• Add shields for protection
• Don't forget power generators!
• Cargo blocks let you carry more resources

Experiment and have fun!

Steps.Title: Ship Building Complete!
Steps.Message: You now know the basics of ship building! Open the Ship Builder [B] anytime to customize your vessel.
